source_caption_data.pre_caption: The video captures a peaceful garden scene with a traditional wooden building and a stone pathway surrounded by lush greenery and colorful trees. A person with a stroller is seen walking along the path, adding a sense of calm movement to the tranquil setting.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: The video captures a peaceful garden scene with a traditional wooden building and a stone pathway surrounded by lush greenery and colorful trees. A person with a stroller is seen walking along the path, adding a sense of calm movement to the tranquil setting.

generated_critique: The caption should mention that the person with the stroller briefly stops to tie their shoe before continuing along the path.

A person with a stroller is seen walking along the path, briefly stopping to tie their shoe before continuing, adding a sense of calm movement to the tranquil setting.
